The operating room nurse complained about her suffering for 10 minutes ("Need coffee. I'm weak today. You have really bad veins.") The access had to be made twice because she couldn't manage it. The anesthesiologist was very nice and competent. In contrast to the OR nurse, very comforting. But also someone other than the doctor from the preliminary talk.

Please do not have endometriosis diagnosed or treated here. Obviously not their area of ‚Äã‚Äãexpertise.

Name: Krankenhaus Marienstift gGmbH
Kommentare:
(Translated by Google) Short version: Arrived at the hospital with severe pain, my niece (13) had to do a Covid19 quick test. Well this one was positive. OK.
This led to panic in the carer who treated her. As a result, she was not even accepted for the actual treatment.
The nurse then wanted to do the PCR test.
After waiting again, the Lord came and said that there were no more tests and that it could not be treated.
She was turned back from the hospital. You should go to the family doctor first on Monday.

Does this hospital have no competence to treat patients with Covid19?
Of course, only Covid19 was positive on the referral to the family doctor.

So that means: if people are infected with Covid19 and have other complaints, they are not treated ???
Will only COVID19 be mentioned in order to keep the statistics stable or are the hospitals simply incompetent?

I say HOSPITALS because almost the same game pulled Salzdahlumer Strasse and Celler Strasse as well.

Everyone just wanted to get rid of them and not treat them.
The CHILD was shooed back and forth for hours.
Incredible system. For over a year the state has not been able to guarantee a structured process.

So I no longer wonder why so many people die.
The real problems are not dealt with at all because people are afraid of being infected with Covid19.

It is not only Covid19 that kills people, ignorance does not protect against death either.

I don't want to know what would have happened if we hadn't insisted on getting treatment.

So never again Marienstift!

Kommentare:

Name: Krankenhaus Marienstift gGmbH
Kommentare:
(Translated by Google) Corona pandemic or not, we are more than disappointed with the women's clinic in Marienstift!
The midwives in the delivery room and the doctors in the operating room were very helpful, friendly and courteous - we felt completely satisfied and looked after there.
Unfortunately, the whole thing looked different on the ward ...
With one or two exceptions, the nurses on the ward were more than overwhelmed and the listlessness was hard to beat.
If you needed help, you were quickly fobbed off, explanations about breastfeeding were not given despite being asked, in case of severe pain I had to wait longer than 10 hours for a doctor / for help, when my daughter had a paused breath, she was only shaken by the sister and I was told: I should stay relaxed, it would be all okay, but that my midwife came up from the delivery room for 30 minutes and took my child away from me to check it doesn't sound like it: IT'S ALL GOOD.
Unfortunately there was very little information and if there was any you got 5 different variants.
In spite of all this, a huge, big thank you goes to the midwives in the delivery room and to the doctors including the appendix in the operating room.
They tried to accompany me perfectly through this unplanned caesarean section.
The only thing you can say about the ward is that you should consider that the rooms are very noisy and statements such as: What does room xx want again, are inappropriate!

Name: Krankenhaus Marienstift gGmbH
Kommentare:
(Translated by Google) We were recommended the Marienstift by well-known people & can only recommend it to everyone.

Our little daughter saw the light of day on October 10, 2020 at 5.45 p.m. We have been hospitalized here for 5 days and are fully cared for. All the staff, whether in the delivery room or on the ward, are very kind and helpful as well as courteous.

The team and the new head doctor are just great.

I would particularly like to address the wonderful midwives on this path:

As lovingly as you can still see through even under constant stress and high performance, I can only take my hat off and express my respect.

For many it's just a job, but what the ladies do there, I can only thank you with my fullest appreciation.

For many parents or parents-to-be who give birth to their first baby, it is a stressful situation that has many emotions and mixed feelings.

Name: Krankenhaus Marienstift gGmbH
Kommentare:
(Translated by Google) Excessively disappointed.
Attention! Cost trap for pregnant women.
We were at the midwife consultation before the birth of our daughter to register in advance and, above all, because we had questions about the construction work. The delivery room had suddenly had to close several times at that time and births could not take place. We had to wait a long time and only got to it when the actual consultation hour had already expired. This was followed by a 15-minute conversation about the construction measures and the weather while we filled out the pre-registration form - with a note that we were considering another hospital because of the construction site situation.
It wasn't a word about birth or my pregnancy. We didn't have any questions about that and there wasn't time for that either.
The bad awakening came afterwards.
The midwives settle the call with the number 0203. This is the same position through which the introductory discussion with your own midwife runs. Each pregnant woman is only reimbursed once. If you have a midwife, pre-registration effectively costs 45 euros!
It is not pointed out what I consider a cheek!
After consultation, this not only happened to me, but also to others from my birth preparation course who were registered during the consultation hour.
So far I have held large pieces on the Marienstift and the Neuerkerode Foundation. We even collected at our wedding service for the Evangelical Foundation Neuerkerode.

After this experience I am now extremely disappointed! Never again if it can be avoided.
